directions: Combine onion, black beans, refried beans, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, green chilis, taco seasoning, cumin, and chili powder. Stir in ground turkey and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. Top with your favorite toppings; such as fresh cilantro, sour cream, cheese, Greek yogurt and/or avocado. Also try it with as a dip with tortilla chips or as a topping over rice.
ingredients: 1 16-oz can refried black beans (if you can't find refried black beans, just use regular refried beans)
1 15-oz can tomato sauce (I use Contadina brand.)
1 14.5-oz can diced tomatoes (I used Contadina brand.)
1 pound ground turkey (ground chicken or beef would work too)
title: Taco Chili in the Crock Pot (7h)
